content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the taurage district court the defendant has been ordered to pay a total of €46159 which includes stamp duty legal fees and court fees in the final resolution of a matrimonial property case the court has awarded the applicant with an audi a4 vehicle the court discusses various aspects related to the division of assets in a divorce case between the plaintiff and the defendant the plaintiff is seeking the dissolution of the marriage and ownership of the car the court determines that the car is community property and awards it to the plaintiff without compensation to the defendant the court also addresses the allocation of costs with the defendant being responsible for paying the stamp duty and costs of serving procedural documents the court allows the action to proceed and dissolves the marriage due to the fault of both spouses

metadata.cost: 175.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 266.67 EUR (legal fees) + 19.92 EUR (court fees)
